scripts.prestart: npm run install-all && npm run start-db
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:auto: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:auto" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev: npm run start-db && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev:auto: npm run start-db && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev:auto" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start-db: npm run start-db-docker || npm run start-db-brew
scripts.start-db-docker: docker run -d -p 27017:27017 --name nst-mongodb mongo:latest || docker start nst-mongodb
scripts.stop-db: docker stop nst-mongodb 2>/dev/null || brew services stop mongodb-community
